snippet: Simon Pagenaud of France won the crash-filled Grand Prix of Baltimore, charging to the lead after a series of collisions involving several other contenders.
abstract: Simon Pagenaud of France wins the crash-filled Grand Prix of Baltimore, charging to the lead after a series of collisions involving several other contenders; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Simon Pagenaud of France won the crash-filled Grand Prix of Baltimore, charging to the lead after a series of collisions involving several other contenders.

headline.main: French Driver Wins Grand Prix of Baltimore
